0.1.0-beta.readme:
# cortex-demo

just one demo about new cortex

## Install

```bash
$ cortex install cortex-demo --save
```

<!--
Wrap examples with a pair of ```
浣跨敤鎴愬鐨� ``` 鏉ュ寘瑁圭ず渚嬨€俓n浠ｇ爜鍧楃殑 ``` 鍚庨潰闇€瑕佸畾涔夎繖閮ㄥ垎浠ｇ爜鐨勭被鍨嬨€傛瘮濡備笂闈㈢殑浠ｇ爜鏄� bash 鑴氭湰锛屽父鐢ㄧ殑鍖呮嫭锛歕nbash, js, json, html, css 绛塡n-->


## Usage

```js
var cortex_demo = require('cortex-demo');
```

<!-- 

NOTICE That this is a sample README.md, in order to define the standard way to organize the information of the current package.

Most usually, you should remove unnecessary sections below.

杩欓噷浠呬粎鏄竴涓ず渚婻EADME锛岀敤浜庡畾涔夋爣鍑嗙殑涔﹀啓瑙勮寖鍜屾枃妗ｆ牸寮忋€俓n澶ч儴鍒嗘椂鍊欙紝濡傛灉娌℃湁浣跨敤鍒板畠浠紝浣犲簲璇ユ妸閫傚綋绉婚櫎杩欎簺鏍忕洰銆俓n-->

### Class: cortex_demo(options)
<!-- 
'Class: <name>' means a constructor that we should use it with the `new` keyword.
'Class: <name>' 琛ㄦ槑瀹冩槸涓€涓瀯閫犲櫒锛屾垜浠簲褰撲娇鐢� `new` 鍏抽敭瀛楁潵鍒濆鍖栥€俓n-->

```js
new cortex_demo({
	name: 'Hulk'
});
```

<!-- 
Simply list arguments
鐩存帴鍒楀嚭鍙傛暟
-->
- options `Object` description of `options`
	- name `String` description of `options.name`
	
Creates a new cortex-demo instance.

<!--
Only differences are listed below.
鎺ヤ笅鏉ユ垜浠彧鍒楀嚭涓嶅悓鐨勫湴鏂筡n-->
	
#### .\<method-name\>(foo, bar, [bee], boo)

<!-- 
A method of the instance. Usually, they should be listed inside the `Class` section as <h4> with 4 hashes.
瀹炰緥锛堝嵆閫氳繃鏋勯€犲櫒 new 鍑烘潵鐨勫璞★級涓婄殑鏂规硶. 涓€鑸潵璇达紝瀹炰緥鏂规硶搴斿綋鍦� Class 鏍忕洰涓紝浣滀负 <h4> 鏍囬鍑虹幇锛�4涓� # 鍙凤級
-->


- foo `String='foo'` description of `foo`
- bar `Boolean=` description of `bar`
- bee `Object` `[]` indicates that it is an optional parameter
  - abc `Buffer` a property of `bee`, i.e. `bee.abc`
- boo `function(arg1, arg2)` what is the method used for

<!--
type ends with `=`(equal) indicates the default value, default to `undefined`.
绫诲瀷鍚庨潰璺熺瓑鍙凤紙=锛夎〃鏄庝簡杩欎釜鍙傛暟鐨勯粯璁ゅ€糪n-->

<!--
Notice the definition of function type and optional parameters
娉ㄦ剰鍑芥暟绫诲瀷瀹氫箟鐨勬弿杩帮紝浠ュ強鍙€夊弬鏁扮殑鍐欐硶
-->

#### Event: '\<event-name>'

<!--
Event name should be single-quoted.
浜嬩欢鍚嶇О搴斿綋浣跨敤鍗曞紩鍙锋嫭璧穃n-->

- e `Object` the first parameter of the callback

<!--
Define the parameters of event handler directly.
鐩存帴寮€濮嬪畾涔変簨浠跺洖璋冪殑鍙傛暟锛岃€屼笉鐢ㄧ疮杩般€俓n-->


### cortex-demo.\<method-name\>(arguments)

<!-- 
The static method.
闈欐€佹柟娉曪紝鍗充笉鏄疄渚嬩笂鐨勬柟娉昞n-->

readme:
cortex-demo

just one demo about new cortex

Install

$ cortex install cortex-demo --save

Usage

var cortex_demo = require('cortex-demo');

Class: cortex_demo(options)

new cortex_demo({
    name: 'Hulk'
});
- options Object description of options - name String description of options.name Creates a new cortex-demo instance.

.\(foo, bar, [bee], boo)

  • foo String='foo' description of foo
  • bar Boolean= description of bar
  • bee Object [] indicates that it is an optional parameter
    • abc Buffer a property of bee, i.e. bee.abc
  • boo function(arg1, arg2) what is the method used for

Event: '\'

  • e Object the first parameter of the callback

cortex-demo.\(arguments)
